title: Brooklyn Beckham's ex Hana Cross engages in heated chat with new beau Nasser Alfallah in LA
text:
Brooklyn Beckham's ex Hana Cross engaged in a very heated chat with new boyfriend Nassar Alfallah in Los Angeles on Tuesday.

During the chat the model, 22, who was wearing a black hoodie and joggers, appeared agitated as she spoke with student Nasser, 19, who leaned against a staircase.

Relations appeared to have deteriorated as Nasser, dressed in an all-black ensemble was seen throwing his arms apart in apparent frustration and speaking with Hana, who looked furious.

What's happened? Brooklyn Beckham's ex Hana Cross engaged in a very heated chat with new boyfriend Nassar Alfallah in Los Angeles on Tuesday

The frosty conversation comes little over a week after Hana and Nasser confirmed their romance when they were seenas they loitered around in a car park outside trendy eatery Nobu.

MailOnline has contacted Hana's representatives for comment.

Their outing comes after David and Victoria Beckham's eldest child Brooklyn, 20, faced a near-certain run-in with his ex Hana when they attended the same Halloween party in Beverly Hills.

To make matters all the more awkward for the former flames, Hana arrived at the soirée with Nasser.

Heated: Relations appeared to have deteriorated as Nasser was seen throwing his arms apart in apparent frustration and speaking with Hana, who looked furious

Close call: Their outing comes after David and Victoria Beckham's eldest child Brooklyn, 20, faced a near-certain run-in with his ex Hana when they attended the same Halloween party

As the gathering got underway, Hana and Nasser shared snaps of themselves partying in costume on Instagram, while Brooklyn kept his night of revelry off social media after making a low-key arrival with a bandanna tied around his face.

The social media sensation's new love interest was recently revealed by MailOnline to be Nasser, who is a Loyola Marymount University student in Los Angeles and is originally from Kuwait.

The brunette beauty's new partner is the younger brother of Mick Jagger's ex Noor Alfallah.

Hana dated Brooklyn for nine months but became known for having several high-profile arguments in public, before splitting earlier this year.

Brooklyn meanwhile is now rumoured to be dating American actress Nicola Peltz, 24, after he was spotted with the beauty for the third time in less than a week on Wednesday.

Before that, the duo set tongues wagging when they left Leonardo DiCaprio's Halloween party together in the early hours of Sunday.

The son of Victoria and David has been linked to a string of women over the past couple of weeks following his split from Hana Cross.

He was seen partying with stunning Canadian actress Natalie Ganzhorn, 21, at a plush Beverly Hills party over the weekend.

Brooklyn was also said to be dating brunette actress Phoebe Torrance, 25, who previously worked as his mother Victoria's lookalike.
description: Brooklyn Beckham's ex Hana Cross engaged in a very heated chat with new boyfriend Nassar Alfallah in Los Angeles on Tuesday.
